projectGridLines.title: Content Creation and Growth
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

1. Content Creation: Assist in creating engaging and visually appealing content for social

media channels, including graphics, videos, and written posts.

2. Strategy Development: Contribute creative ideas and insights to help shape social

media strategies that align with our goals and objectives.

Skill sets:

Communication, Content Creation, Leadership, Event Production, Organization,

Hospitality, Negotiation

Traits expectation:

Driven and adaptable individual seeking to broaden expertise across interdisciplinary

fields, including Chemical Engineering and Technology

Expected learning:

1 Hands-on experience in a fast-growing industry.

2. Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.

Specific courses required for project execution:

1.Print And Audio Visual Advertising

2.Organizational Psychology

3.Fundamentals Of Finance And Accounting

4.Business Analysis And Valuation

5.Process Plant Safety

6.Environmental Pollution Control
